13:46 <sburjan`> good morning vmassol ! Thanks for creating the repo !!!  
13:47 <vmassol> np  
13:47 <sburjan`> I have only one question: the thread "[xwiki-devs] [VOTE] Modification to groupid for contrib projects" is about the group ID from the pom.xml file, right ? It's not about the repo name, right ?  
13:48 <vmassol> correct  
13:48 <sburjan`> thanks.  
13:48 <sburjan`> I'll make sure I follow the rule :)  
13:48 <vmassol> we don't have any rule yet for the repo name  
14:11 <SvenDowideit> has quit

16:38 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
16:39 <mflorea> has quit  
17:05 <vmassol> has quit  
17:31 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
18:26 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
18:27 <sdumitriu> Greetings from Mountain View  
18:27 <vmassol> oh  
18:27 <vmassol> didn't realize the GSOC summiwas now  
18:27 <vmassol> :)  
18:27 <vmassol> nice  
18:27 <vmassol> I envy you….  
18:28 <sdumitriu> Did you find a RM for Monday?  
18:28 <vmassol> I'll probably do it  
18:28 <vmassol> at least start the stabilization  
18:28 <vmassol> and if ready start it, if not fabio or me will do it on Tuesday  
18:28 <vmassol> what we need ATM is that all devs  
18:29 <vmassol> look at the CI  
18:29 <vmassol> and fix the build issues  
18:29 <vmassol> jv has made platform fail on friday  
18:29 <vmassol> but that's not the biggest thing to fix; a lot of functional tests are failing  
18:30 <vmassol> (and flickering ones need to be fixed because that's too much a pain - we got tons of daily emails about jenkins)  
18:30 <sdumitriu> Yes, saw that  
18:31 <vmassol> make sure you speak to other wiki/collaboration communities at GSOC summit! And invite them to our dev room @ FOSDEM maybe...  
18:34 <sdumitriu> Oh, did you get an answer?  
18:34 <vmassol> nope  
18:34 <sdumitriu> They were supposed to announce the devrooms mid-october  
18:34 <sdumitriu> It's past mid  
18:34 <vmassol> right....  
18:34 <sdumitriu> I have a presentation at the summt  
18:35 <vmassol> cool, what topic?  
18:35 <sdumitriu> Ensuring the continuing success of a GSoC project  
18:35 <sdumitriu> http://sergiu.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Presentation/GSoCMS?skin=Presentation.PresentationSkin#1  
18:35 <vmassol> ahah nice app ;)  
18:37 <vmassol> 10-15% chance of failure only! I'd have said more like 80% chance of failure  
18:37 <vmassol> depends what we call failure I guess  
18:38 <sdumitriu> Right...  
18:38 <vmassol> for me failure = the code isn't integrated  
18:38 <sdumitriu> I mean complete failure  
18:38 <vmassol> ok  
18:38 <sdumitriu> I'll add that  
18:38 <sdumitriu> You're right  
18:39 <vmassol> "t's OK to also have personal communication just with the mentor". Yep, same as our IRC chats; the rule being that anything important should find its way on the list (so that other committers/sonctributors who're not online can have the time to see them)  
18:40 <sdumitriu> Probably fixed platform build  
18:40 <vmassol> ah coo  
18:40 <vmassol> l  
18:41 <vmassol> "towards the end there should be a few commits per day". I'd say this should happen starrting from at least the middle of the period (if not sooner)  
18:41 <sdumitriu> These need to be updated since there's no more QuickLinks panel: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/1864/testReport/  
18:42 <sdumitriu> Yes, I'll say that, but the idea is that it should definitely be this way towards the end  
18:42 <vmassol> there's still a quick links panel  
18:42 <vmassol> it contains only 1 entry now  
18:42 <vmassol> (sandbox)  
18:44 <vmassol> actually for us a nice project in contrib that lives on and with a published etxension is also a success  
18:45 <vmassol> (it doesn't necessarily have to be integrated in the platform)  
18:45 <vmassol> (I think)  
18:45 <vmassol> (because we have that extension model)  
18:46 <sdumitriu> I think being in the platform is better  
18:46 <vmassol> what's really important is that what is coded can be used in a useful manner by users  
18:46 <vmassol> of course what's really key is that it's maintained  
18:46 <vmassol> that can be done by offloading to committers (integrated in platform) or in a maintained contrib project  
18:46 <vmassol> (or of course the saint graal which is to become a committer ;))  
18:47 <vmassol> "can be used in a useful manner by users" == extension for us  
18:47 <vmassol> (be it a platform extension or a contrib extension)  
18:48 <vmassol> of course contrib doesn't mean not following the project's best practices  
18:48 <vmassol> anyway  
18:48 <vmassol> just thinking aloud here :)  
18:48 <vmassol> interesting presentation for brainstomring with the other orgs  
18:48 <sdumitriu> Yes  
18:48 <sdumitriu> Finished reading?  
18:48 <vmassol> another good presentation would have been:  
18:48 <vmassol> how to attract contributors to your project  
18:48 <vmassol> ;)  
18:48 <vmassol> yep finished  
18:48 <sdumitriu> Any other suggestions?  
18:49 <vmassol> nope looks good  
18:49 <vmassol> missing images of course  
18:49 <sdumitriu> (I changed already with what you said)  
18:49 <vmassol> (too much text)  
18:49 <sdumitriu> Thanks for the feedback  
18:49 <vmassol> but that's another story ;)  
18:49 <vmassol> (at least it's self explanatory)  
18:49 <sdumitriu> Yeah, I always start with lots of ideas for images to use instead of text  
18:49 <sdumitriu> But in the end I always end up with all-text  
18:50 <vmassol> I don't know how much time you have, it might be long or not  
18:50 <sdumitriu> Me neither...  
18:50 <sdumitriu> There's no schedule  
18:50 <sdumitriu> Jerome is late  
18:50 <sdumitriu> Didn't see him so far  
18:51 <vmassol> brb  
18:59 <sdumitriu> Found Jerome  
19:03 <vmassol> back  
19:05 <sdumitriu> has quit

21:09 <sburjan`> vmassol1: now that I see the repo created I have a ton of ideas on how to better improve what I've done so far. I'll have to send a very long mail on devlist to ask questions :)  
21:35 <vmassol1> ok great :)
